body.name: Vera Bradley Women's Softside Underseat Rolling Work Bag Luggage, Botanical Paisley, One Size
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 46 mins
features: CHARGE IT UP -- The exterior of this carryon complaint bag features a USB port so you can charge your devices while on the go (battery pack not included, an ID window, and 2 zip compartments - ideal for storing your wallet, phone, reading material, or snacks to keep them quick to access but out of sight

MOBILE WITH MULTIPLE BAGS -- Either grab the easy access quick stash handle or fasten over luggage with the trolley sleeve – either way you can keep your most important items securely protected so you can focus on conquering the day

PACK IN STYLE -- Made from a durable & water repellent fabrication, these bags are perfect for business or leisure travel with soft sides that allow some flexibility in packing – with TSA lock included for enhanced security

MAKE EVERY DAY EASY -- The main compartment features 1 mesh zip pocket, 2 compression straps while the front compartment features a padded laptop sleeve & 2 elastic mesh pockets - plenty of room for files, paperwork, laptop & charger

STYLISH, LIGHTWEIGHT & SIZED RIGHT -- The Underseat Rolling Work Bag measures 17 inches high; 14 inches wide; & 9 inches deep - the perfect combination of business & pleasure to take you from the commute to the office to drinks downtown
body.description: Vera Bradley is your go-to brand for rolling suitcases with spinner wheels and rolling travel luggage. You can purchase just one suitcase or matching suit cases to make your own unique suitcase set. Exterior features a zip pockets and a zip compartment. Front compartment features a laptop sleeve and two elastic mesh pockets. ID window. Main compartment features a mesh zip pocket, an elastic slip pocket for USB battery pack (not included) and two compression straps. Trolley sleeve. Lining zips out for easy cleaning. Mounted lock with USB port. Zip closures. LINING: Remove lining; machine wash cold, gentle cycle, only non-chlorine bleach when needed; line dry SHELL: Spot clean with mild detergent and a soft, damp cloth, rinse thoroughly; lay flat to dry

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 150 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #236,409 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #287 in Carry-On Luggage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just perfect for airplane
reviews.reviewText: As a 60 year old woman who has some physical limitation including lifting weight, particularly overhead, this is the perfect bag. I can get my laptopk, Kindle, and all my cords into it. Got my bag of necessities that I don't want to pack in luggage. And I can roll it around or lift it by handles. Plus it's cute. Fits under seat perfectly,. Just perfect for what I need. I don't have to ask someone else on plane for help. My backpack is now officially retired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really attractive and great roominess. I’m slightly worried it’s longer than allowable but I will see for myself soon enough. With the wheels and handle, it seems long but I cannot say for sure until my trip. Removable wheels would be great, especially since it attaches to the main luggage by the strap. I love the look and space, however.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great in airports!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this bag!! So much easier to get thro airports than carrying my heavy VB weekender! It fit under the seat on my 2 American Airlines flights I have had so far. It held everything I wanted to carry on the plane. All the pockets were great for organizing my things. As an older woman traveling alone I love this bag!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beware of size quotes
reviews.reviewText: Both cute, high quality bags. Ordered the paisley last year, haven't used, decided to try the flowered one because posted description and tag description stated same measurement's, except flowered one was suppose to be 3" deeper. WRONG! Actual size for flowered bag is 15x13x8, considerably smaller! Regarding weight complaints . . . they have wheels, for rolling! You shouldn't need to pick up much, and I think heavier/higher grade materials may account for weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Carrying a backpack in airports was killing my shoulder. This is cute, plenty of space for what I need. I took it on a flight last week and it fit perfectly under the seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just used it for the first time September 15. I would return it, but it is too late. When it is packed it is very heavy. I’m a senior lady and had trouble getting it attached to the handle of my suit case.I’m thinking of leaving it in the hotel and buying something else for my return trip home. Something that I can manage better.It might be okay for a young strong person. It is pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the bag shape, size, and quality but I was really disappointed when I found it would not slip down onto my checked bag handle and the handles on the bag itself are not long enough to carry over the shoulder. It’s great as long as you can roll it along.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for quick trips
reviews.reviewText: I do a lot of one or two night trips for work and this bag is perfect. What I love the most is that it doesn’t scream suitcase so when I do a one day trip and have to bring it with me to my meetings, it just looks like a roller business bag. The separate pocket for my laptop in work stuff makes it so nice that I’m not opening up my suitcase and showing my clothes to the people I meeting with.I never have put it under the seat so I don’t know for sure if it fits under the seat I use it more as the luggage in the overhead compartment, but it isn’t large. It easily holds clothes and hair stuff and make up for two days.

The bag itself is a great size however it was much heavier than I thought it would be. You can't take much with you because of airline weight restrictions. The carry handles are a bit long and get caught in the wheels. I have to tuck the handle in when wheeling the bag.
